Articles.Content:
Hihi KSP enthusiasts!

I have started this thread to provide notice of my livestreams, and links to videos from the same for any and all who might have interest in viewing.

I invite you all to join in the moderately to almost successful attempts I make at expanding the Kerbals` understanding of their solar system, engineering innovation, as well as live challenge attempts and other activities.

The channel can be found here: http://www.twitch.tv/hoshizora

here is a selection of some of my most recent (mis)adventures

The dramatic conclusion of my entry in the 36 hour challenge:

http://www.twitch.tv/hoshizora/c/2253026

Fun with things that go around and around, a.k.a. the spinny adventure of Jonmy

http://www.twitch.tv/hoshizora/c/2282343

Critical failure yes, but at least it was early in the mission rather than later: (a.k.a. Need I continue?)

http://www.twitch.tv/hoshizora/c/2252145

The dramatic resolution of a most time consuming rescue, following a most unnecessary disaster (a.k.a. at least no one died)

http://www.twitch.tv/hoshizora/c/2404918

I hope some of my videos and adventures might be enjoyed by like minded KSP fans, and to that end I will update this thread if and when I go live, and additionally with links to video clips and such for those without the time to follow a full live stream.

To get the ball rolling, going live right now! Hope to see you there~

Going live now, for some space action action action!

Come and join in!

going live now to attempt this challenge http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/36023-Kerbol-Project-A-Project-of-Exploration-and-Discovery

see you there!

Going live shortly to begin some play with the mission controller mod! http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/34026-0-20-2-Mission-Controller-v0-8-%2806-19-2013%29-ALPHA

We will create a brand new space programme from the ground up (oh yes all the pun intended).

Hope to see you~ http://www.twitch.tv/hoshizora
going live again for some mission controller mod space action fun!

Today my space program is going reusable! All reusable all of the time.

Going live in a few minutes, and hope to see you there!

Protips:

- Be unique. Seeing someone just shooting some average stuff into space... no need to watch that, seen it before.

- Prepare your commentary a bit. Nothing worse than someone just mumbling to himself.

What I liked:

+ You announce what you will do in the livestream. (Reusable and so on).

+ You seem to have an average framerate which is good for a livestream.

Would love to see more.

Back online in a few minutes for more attempts at making this damn program profitable!

Although having upgraded to the latest deadly reentry, things might be slightly more burnt, twisted and/or sheared than previously, and thus slightly to significantly less reusable.

But lets give it a shot all the same! see you there~

Going live shortly for some more mission controller mod gameplay.

Space tourism begins!
Do you want a live stream race. I had one with 13tim37 on twitch a few days ago. And I lost.

sounds like a nice offer for some day, quite occupied with this mission controller business at the moment.

Going live in a few minutes, mid mission- first space tourists to the Mun!!
